rows.label: campfev11_0500_msg0001
rows.name:
Before we board the ferry
at Yajika Harbor, we should
take care of that ether miasma.

rows.label: campfev11_0500_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes!
Please leave it to me!

rows.label: campfev11_0500_msg0005
rows.name:
If it's going to cause trouble
for someone down the line, isn't it
better that we deal with it now?

rows.label: campfev11_0500_msg0007
rows.name:
Well... I am curious about Kasumi's
ether-manipulation powers,
so I guess I'll tag along.
